2.text: I'm Amanda. Every Sunday, I ……… (go/goes) to town with my mother. First, we …..…(go/goes) to the public library. I ………. (borrow/ borrows) two new books every week. I ........……(like/likes) to read adventure stories best. Then we........... (buy/buys) newspapers for father. After that we ……... (go/goes) to the Sunday fair. Mother ……….. (spend/ spends) some time there because she ..…….(buy/ buys) only fresh fruit and vegetables. Next we ..……(shop/shops) at the grocery store. Our next stop is the bakery. Mother ……...(let/ lets) me select something for tea. She also ……….(allow/allows) me to pick some candy at the confectioners'. I……(buy/buys) some for my little brother as well. I ……(know/ knows) he is waiting for those. Finally we…….(get/gets) on a bus and ..…… (return/returns) home.
